definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: But you got to set up one for every link.
sentences.chinese: 但是你必須爲每一個連接建立一箇中繼器。

sentences.english: The repeater responds only to received signals with its specific PL tone.
sentences.chinese: 哪個中繼器只對它自己特定專用線路的信號進行迴應。

sentences.english: In this dissertation, relay is the main field in the study of the cooperative communication in homogeneous network.
sentences.chinese: 本文對於同構網內協同通信主要集中在中繼器的研究。
